sentences.en: 4 gradient arrays marked A, B, C and D were set up.
sentences.cn: 布置了编号为A, B, C,D的四个梯度排列.

sentences.en: Adjust the gradient so the dark side is on the bottom left.
sentences.cn: 调整梯度,使黑暗的一面是对左下角.

sentences.en: Conclusion: High purity of MSC can be obtained by density gradient centrifugation.
sentences.cn: 结论: 密度梯度离心法分离获得的人胚胎骨髓间充质干细胞纯度高.

sentences.en: Examples of interactions are mass transfer caused by temperature gradient.
sentences.cn: 温度梯度所引起的质量转移是交叉作用的例子.

sentences.en: Standard Test Method for Density of Plastics by the Density - Gradient Technique.
sentences.cn: 用密度梯度法测定塑料密度的试验方法.(英文版).

sentences.en: The car slid down the steep gradient into the river.
sentences.cn: 汽车滑下陡峭的斜坡掉入河中.

sentences.en: The intent here is to identify the basic ingredients of gradient methods.
sentences.cn: 本节的目的就是了解一下梯度法的基本内容.

sentences.en: The mountain rises to the height of 1,600 feet by an easy gradient.
sentences.cn: 这座山高1,600英尺,坡度平缓.

sentences.en: The reaction rate is limited by the concentration gradient of oxygen in the sample.
sentences.cn: 反应速率受试样中氧浓度梯度的限制.

sentences.en: The residence gradient for lung cancer was strongest among nonsmokers.
sentences.cn: 肺癌的居住区梯度在不吸烟者当中最大.

sentences.en: The resulting solution is known as the gradient.
sentences.cn: 合成解就是通常的梯度风.

sentences.en: There is no pressure gradient through the thickness of the film.
sentences.cn: 贯穿流体膜厚度无压力梯度.

sentences.en: This indicates a hydrodynamic condition with a very marked potentiometric gradient.
sentences.cn: 这说明水动力条件具有很明显的位能梯度.

sentences.en: Two main types can be distinguished: ecoclines ( clines along an ecological gradient ).
sentences.cn: 有两个主要类型可以区分,即生态梯度变异 ( 即沿着生态梯度出现的梯度变异 ).

sentences.en: Unconstrained optimization methods include gradient, conjugate direction, Newton, and quasi - Newton methods.
sentences.cn: 无约束最优化方法包括梯度法 、 共轭方向法 、 牛顿法和拟牛顿法.

words.tran_cn: 分阶段；定等级；坡度缓和
定等级；减缓坡度（grade的现在分词形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 密度梯度，密度陡度；密度涨落
密度梯度离心法；密度梯度离心分离法
线性梯度；线性渐变，线性渐变填充
电位梯度；势梯度；位能坡度
垂直梯度；垂直方向梯度
电压梯度；电压坡；比电压

trans.tran_cn: [物]梯度，陡度，（温度、气压等）变化率，梯度变化曲线，<英>（道路的）倾斜度，坡度
trans.tran_en: a slope or a degree of slope, especially in a road or railway
